short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See who doesn't follow you back

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View details about your followers, like who doesn't follow you back and who you don't follow back!
First, open a new tab and navigate to Instagram. Then click on the extension and type in your @username to see more!

*Requests usually take a few seconds, especially for more than 10k followers.
